All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
The Administrator class represents a specific type of staff member, inheriting from the Staff class.
AdministratorController
The AdministratorController class provides methods for managing staff, inventory, and appointments, allowing the administrator to add, update, remove, and filter staff and inventory data.
AdministratorUI
The AdministratorUI class provides a user interface for administrators to manage hospital staff, appointments, and medication inventory, and approve replenishment requests.
Appointment
The Appointment class represents an appointment between a doctor and a patient.
AppointmentController
The AppointmentController class manages the creation of new appointments between doctors and patients.
AppointmentListView
The AppointmentListView class implements the IListDisplayableView interface for displaying a list of appointments in a formatted table.
AppointmentOutcomeController
The AppointmentOutcomeController class manages the creation and handling of appointment outcome records.
AppointmentOutcomeRecord
The AppointmentOutcomeRecord class stores the details of an appointment's outcome, including the type of service provided, consultation notes, and any prescribed medications.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordView
The AppointmentOutcomeRecordView class implements the IDisplayableView interface for displaying the details of an Appointment Outcome Record, including information about the appointment, the type of service provided, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.
AppointmentOutcomeUI
The AppointmentOutcomeUI class provides a user interface for creating appointment outcomes, enabling doctors to record services, consultation notes, and prescribed medications for a selected appointment.
AppointmentRepository
The AppointmentRepository class manages the storage and retrieval of appointment data.
AppointmentStatus
The AppointmentStatus enum represents the various statuses that an appointment can have.
AppointmentUI
The AppointmentUI class provides a user interface to display appointments categorized by their status.
AppointmentView
The AppointmentView class implements the IDisplayableView interface for displaying details of a single Appointment.
AuthController
The AuthController class handles user authentication and password management.
Availability
The Availability class represents a specific time slot for a particular day of the week, including the start and end time.
AvailabilityController
The AvailabilityController class manages a doctor's availability schedule, allowing retrieval and updates to the schedule.
AvailabilityUI
The AvailabilityUI class provides a user interface for managing a doctor's availability schedule.
CommonView
The CommonView class provides utility methods for common UI tasks, such as printing formatted separators and handling user input.
DataInitialiser
The DataInitialiser class is responsible for loading and initializing application data from CSV files.
DataStore
The DataStore class is responsible for saving various types of application data to CSV files, including staff, patient, appointment, doctor availability, medicine, request, and medical history data.
Doctor
The Doctor class represents a doctor with a list of appointments and a weekly schedule of availability.
DoctorAppointmentUI
A user interface for managing a doctor's appointments, allowing the doctor to view, accept, or decline appointment requests.
DoctorController
The DoctorController class provides methods for a doctor to manage patients, appointments, and medical records, including functions to find patients, access medical histories, and filter appointments by status.
DoctorMedicalRecordUI
User interface for managing medical records, allowing doctors to view and edit patient medical histories, diagnoses, and treatment plans.
DoctorUI
Provides a user interface for doctors to manage their appointments, availability, and patient medical records, including options for viewing schedules, setting availability, and recording appointment outcomes.
Gender
The Gender enum represents the possible gender identities.
IDisplayableView<T>
The IDisplayableView interface provides a method for displaying a specific object of type T.
IListDisplayableView<T>
The IListDisplayableView interface provides a method for displaying a list of objects of type T.
InventoryRepository
The InventoryRepository class provides methods to manage medication and request repositories.
LoginUI
The LoginUI class provides a user interface for logging into the system.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
ManageInventoryUI
 
ManageStaffUI
 
MedicalHistory
The MedicalHistory class represents the medical history of a patient, including their diagnosis, treatment plan, and prescribed medications.
MedicalHistoryListView
The MedicalHistoryListView class is responsible for displaying a list of medical history records.
MedicalHistoryView
The MedicalHistoryView class is responsible for displaying the details of a single medical history record.
MedicalRecord
The MedicalRecord class represents the medical record of a patient, including personal details and a list of medical history entries.
Medication
The Medication class represents a medication with attributes such as name, stock level, and a low-stock threshold.
Nurse
The Nurse class represents a nurse in the system, extending the Staff class.
NurseController
The NurseController class provides methods for nurses to manage patient data, including adding, retrieving, and removing patients from the system.
NurseUI
 
Patient
The Patient class represents a patient in the system, inheriting from the User class.
PatientAppointmentUI
Provides a user interface for managing patient appointments, including viewing available slots, scheduling, rescheduling, canceling, and displaying appointments for a specific patient.
PatientController
The PatientController class manages operations related to a specific patient.
PatientMedicalRecordUI
The PatientMedicalRecordUI class provides a user interface for managing and displaying a patient's medical record, allowing patients to view, edit, and interact with medical history and appointment outcome records.
PatientUI
The PatientUI class provides a user interface for patients to interact with the system.
PatientView
The PatientView class is responsible for displaying the details of a patient.
PendingMedicineView
The PendingMedicineView class is responsible for displaying appointments that have prescribed medications and their corresponding statuses.
Pharmacist
The Pharmacist class represents a pharmacist in the system, inheriting from the Staff class.
PharmacistController
The PharmacistController class provides methods for managing medication stock and updating prescriptions within appointments.
PharmacistUI
The PharmacistUI class provides a user interface for a pharmacist to interact with the system.
PrescribedMedication
The PrescribedMedication class represents a medication that has been prescribed to a patient.
PrescriptionStatus
The PrescriptionStatus enum represents the status of a prescription.
Request
The Request class represents a request for a medication made by a pharmacist or any authorized staff member.
RequestStatus
The RequestStatus enum represents the status of a request.
Role
The Role enum represents the various roles within the healthcare system.
ScheduleView
The ScheduleView class is responsible for displaying the weekly schedule of availability.
Staff
The Staff class is an abstract class that represents a staff member in the hospital system.
StaffController
 
StaffListView
The StaffListView class is responsible for displaying a list of staff members.
StaffView
The StaffListView class is responsible for displaying a list of staff members.
User
The User class represents a generic user in the hospital system.
UserController
 
UserRepository
The UserRepository class provides methods for managing user entities in a static repository.
ViewInventory
The ViewInventory class implements IDisplayableView to display detailed information about a specific medication, including stock levels and low stock status.
ViewListInventory
The ViewListInventory class implements IListDisplayableView to display a list of medications in the inventory, including stock levels, alert levels, and low stock status.
